data.event: Montevideo was platted in 1870, and incorporated as a city in 1908.
Montevideo was platted in 1870, and incorporated as a city in 1908.

event.title: played an integral part in the United States - Dakota Conflict of 1862

data.event: The Minnesota River Valley and Montevideo played an integral part in the United States - Dakota Conflict of 1862.

event.title: fall of 1862, the Dakota combatants surrendered and released

data.event: At this site in the fall of 1862, the Dakota combatants surrendered and released 269 captives to Colonel Henry Sibley.
The Camp Release Monument was dedicated on July 4, 1894.
In 2004, the city was honored with the presentation of the National Civic League's All-America City Award, which is given to only ten cities a year.
